author: Amanda Macias
title: Pentagon estimates that coronavirus will plague US for months as Trump pushes to restart economy
description: The virus has infected more than 398,000 worldwide, though many have recovered. In the U.S. more than 46,500 cases have been reported so far.
content:
WASHINGTON The Pentagon's top leaders said Tuesday that they were planning for the coronavirus pandemic to plague the United States for months. 
"I think we need to plan for this to be a few months long at least and we're taking all precautionary measures to… [+1852 chars]
